IpoDetails.Name: Dreamfolks Services Limited

AboutCompany: Harsha Engineers International Limited* (HEIL) is promoted by Harsha Group, a leading manufacturer of precision bearing cages in the world. The promoters of the company are Mr. Ramesh Harsha, Mr. Ravi Harsha and Mr. Rajesh Harsha. Mr. Ramesh Harsha is the Chairman of the company and Mr. Ravi Harsha is the Managing Director of the company. Mr. Rajesh Harsha is the Executive Director of the company. Mr. Ramesh Harsha is the Chairman of the company and Mr. Ravi Harsha is the Managing Director of the company. Mr. Rajesh Harsha is the Executive Director of the company.

CPromoters.Value1:
1. TMB is a professionally managed bank and does not have any promoter. The bank is owned by the shareholders.
2. TMB is a professionally managed bank and does not have any promoter. The bank is owned by the shareholders.

IssueObjective.Value: 1. To meet the working capital requirements of the company.
IssueObjective.Value1: 2. To meet the general corporate purposes of the company.
IssueObjective.Value2: 3. To meet the expenses of the issue.

AnchorInvestors:
To meet the working capital
 requirements of the company.
